con:part.con:content: <wsdl:definitions targetNamespace="http://jonclarke.dev/movies/web-service" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:sch="http://jonclarke.dev/movies/web-service" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:tns="http://jonclarke.dev/movies/web-service"> <wsdl:types> <xs:schema elementFormDefault="qualified" targetNamespace="http://jonclarke.dev/movies/web-service" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xs:element name="listMoviesRequest"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence></xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="listMoviesResponse"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="movies" type="tns:Movie"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="getMovieRequest"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="id" type="xs:int"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="getMovieResponse"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="movie" type="tns:Movie"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="addMovieRequest"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="movie" type="tns:newMovie"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="addMovieResponse"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="movie" type="tns:Movie"/> <xs:element name="message" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="updateMovieRequest"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="movie" type="tns:Movie"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="updateMovieResponse"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="movie" type="tns:Movie"/> <xs:element name="message" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="deleteMovieRequest"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="id" type="xs:int"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="deleteMovieResponse"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="movie" type="tns:Movie"/> <xs:element name="message" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:complexType name="newMovie"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="title" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="description" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="releaseDate" type="xs:dateTime"/> <xs:element name="availableOnDvd" type="xs:boolean"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="Movie"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="id" type="xs:int"/> <xs:element name="title" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="description" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="releaseDate" type="xs:dateTime"/> <xs:element name="availableOnDvd" type="xs:boolean"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:schema> </wsdl:types> <wsdl:message name="getMovieResponse"> <wsdl:part element="tns:getMovieResponse" name="getMovieResponse"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="updateMovieResponse"> <wsdl:part element="tns:updateMovieResponse" name="updateMovieResponse"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="deleteMovieRequest"> <wsdl:part element="tns:deleteMovieRequest" name="deleteMovieRequest"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="addMovieRequest"> <wsdl:part element="tns:addMovieRequest" name="addMovieRequest"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="updateMovieRequest"> <wsdl:part element="tns:updateMovieRequest" name="updateMovieRequest"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="addMovieResponse"> <wsdl:part element="tns:addMovieResponse" name="addMovieResponse"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="listMoviesRequest"> <wsdl:part element="tns:listMoviesRequest" name="listMoviesRequest"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="listMoviesResponse"> <wsdl:part element="tns:listMoviesResponse" name="listMoviesResponse"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="getMovieRequest"> <wsdl:part element="tns:getMovieRequest" name="getMovieRequest"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="deleteMovieResponse"> <wsdl:part element="tns:deleteMovieResponse" name="deleteMovieResponse"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:portType name="MoviesPort"> <wsdl:operation name="getMovie"> <wsdl:input message="tns:getMovieRequest" name="getMovieRequest"></wsdl:input> <wsdl:output message="tns:getMovieResponse" name="getMovieResponse"></wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="updateMovie"> <wsdl:input message="tns:updateMovieRequest" name="updateMovieRequest"></wsdl:input> <wsdl:output message="tns:updateMovieResponse" name="updateMovieResponse"></wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="deleteMovie"> <wsdl:input message="tns:deleteMovieRequest" name="deleteMovieRequest"></wsdl:input> <wsdl:output message="tns:deleteMovieResponse" name="deleteMovieResponse"></wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="addMovie"> <wsdl:input message="tns:addMovieRequest" name="addMovieRequest"></wsdl:input> <wsdl:output message="tns:addMovieResponse" name="addMovieResponse"></wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="listMovies"> <wsdl:input message="tns:listMoviesRequest" name="listMoviesRequest"></wsdl:input> <wsdl:output message="tns:listMoviesResponse" name="listMoviesResponse"></wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:portType> <wsdl:binding name="MoviesPortSoap11" type="tns:MoviesPort"> <soap:binding style="document" transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <wsdl:operation name="getMovie"> <soap:operation soapAction=""/> <wsdl:input name="getMovieRequest"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output name="getMovieResponse"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="updateMovie"> <soap:operation soapAction=""/> <wsdl:input name="updateMovieRequest"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output name="updateMovieResponse"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="deleteMovie"> <soap:operation soapAction=""/> <wsdl:input name="deleteMovieRequest"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output name="deleteMovieResponse"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="addMovie"> <soap:operation soapAction=""/> <wsdl:input name="addMovieRequest"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output name="addMovieResponse"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="listMovies"> <soap:operation soapAction=""/> <wsdl:input name="listMoviesRequest"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output name="listMoviesResponse"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:binding> <wsdl:service name="MoviesPortService"> <wsdl:port binding="tns:MoviesPortSoap11" name="MoviesPortSoap11"> <soap:address location="http://localhost:8080/ws"/> </wsdl:port> </wsdl:service> </wsdl:definitions>
